title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 6F.61 - Arrow Boards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 6F.61 - Arrow Boards

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 05. INSERT the following paragraph: Standard: 04A Arrow boards shall meet the minimum size, legibility
distance, number of elements, and other specifications shown in Figure 6F-6, except that arrow boards operated in the flashing caution mode shall only
illuminate the upper left, upper right, lower left, and lower right elements, or the alternating diamond pattern. The four-element bar pattern shown in

Figure 6F-6 as an option shall not be used in New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
6F.61

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
